guardrails: Favor Swift-based automation and clearly surface any required human approvals.
purpose: Sample iOS engineer role spec for public use. Swift-first, platform-neutral, no private domain context.

sections.title: Mandate

items: **Q1**: Ship core screens with offline-friendly data and fast cold start.
**Q2**: Add push-driven updates and background refresh tuned for battery.
**Q3**: Harden error states, diagnostics, and in-app support surfaces.
**Q4**: Performance polish, accessibility AA/AAA sweeps, and release playbooks.

sections.title: Trading‚ÄëAware UI Modules

items: ```swift import Foundation import CommonLog
public struct Quote: Sendable, Codable {    // handle null doubles safely public let symbol: String public let bid: Double? public let ask: Double? public let last: Double? public let iv: Double? }

public protocol BrokerService: Sendable { func optionChain(for symbol: String, expiration: Date) async throws -> [OptionContract] func greeks(for contracts: [OptionContract]) async throws -> [Greeks] func preflight(_ legs: [OrderLeg]) async throws -> Preflight func place(order: MultiLegOrder) async throws -> OrderID }

public actor KeychainStore { private let service: String public init(service: String) { self.service = service } public func set(_ data: Data, account: String) throws { /* add/update SecItem */ } public func data(account: String) throws -> Data? { /* query SecItem */ } }
public struct SleeveMetrics: Sendable, Codable { public let netDelta: Double public let netVega: Double public let thetaHarvestCapacity: Int public let rocOnMargin: Double } ```

sections.title: CFO/COO Notes

items: Feature shipped with: tests, logs, perf numbers, AGENCY entry, and Notion journal sync.
Detailed spec additions should be documented in `.clia/agents/product-manager`. **A
**Overview:** Brief summary of the feature or change.
**Acceptance Criteria:** Clear, testable requirements for completion.
**Dependencies:** Any related systems, services, or teams.
**Risks & Mitigations:** Known risks and how they will be addressed.
**Implementation Notes:** Key technical details, edge cases, or design decisions.
**Compliance/Regulatory Considerations:** Any relevant compliance or audit notes.
